divs: Sighting DetailsWas closing the bedroom blinds and noticed a brilliant light toward the west which was too big and bright to be a star.
Summary: Horizontal bright lights stationary above the Oquirrh Mountains. Observed for 20 minutes in one spot and then it moved east.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Sandy
There were no other sightings in Sandy on or around May 2nd 0001
